text: aur yaad karo jab hamane is ghar (kaaba) ko logon ko lie kendr aur shaantisthal banaaya - aur, "ibaraaheem ke sthal mein se kisee jagah ko namaaz kee jagah bana lo!" - aur ibaraaheem aur isamaeel ko zimmedaar banaaya. "tum mere is ghar ko tavaaf karanevaalon aur etikaaf karanevaalon ke lie aur rukoo aur sajada karanevaalon ke lie paak-saaf rakho.
